mapper.select: SELECT u.id AS userId, u.username, u.phone, r.role_name AS roleName FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE u.phone = #{phone} AND u.status = 'ACTIVE'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (phone, password, username) VALUES (#{phone}, #{password}, #{username})
